page.title: 07SCHOOL GAMES2-WEST SLEEKBURN
page.content:
By{Lynne Henderson}and{Lisa Stewart
These games are played in the girls yard at West Sleekburn Middle School.
{My Red Letter}-One person says a letter then continues with others one at a time.The rest of the group line up several metres away and if the have the letter given in their name they move one step forward.However, if the letter is the same as the first one anyone who moves must go back to the start.The winner is the first to cover the distance.
{Tuggy on the Lines}-One person is 'on' and must chase and touch the others. They can only run within the lines of the netball and tennis court marked on the school yard.The centre circle is a den or safe area.
